member.name: T:Topsens.Unity.Permission
member.summary: The permission management under Unity Android platform (Dedicated for TOPSENS own cameras).

member.name: M:Topsens.Unity.Permission.SensorCount(System.Int32@)
member.summary: Gets the count of available sensors.
member.returns: if the call succeeds, otherwise refer to for the specific meaning.

member.name: M:Topsens.Unity.Permission.Request(System.Int32,Topsens.Unity.PermissionHandler)
member.param: The index value of the sensor to use (starting from 0).
Callback handler to process permission requesting result.
member.returns: True if the call succeeds, otherwise false.

member.name: M:Topsens.Unity.Permission.IsRequesting
member.summary: Checks whether sensor permission is being requested.
member.returns: True if sensor permission is being requested, otherwise false.

member.name: M:Topsens.Unity.Permission.GetIdentity
member.summary: Gets the sensor's ID which has been granted with the permission.
member.returns: Sensor ID if the call succeeds. Exception is thrown if called on a sensor without permission.

member.name: P:Topsens.Unity.Permission.IsGranted
member.summary: Checks whether sensor permission has been granted.
member.returns: True if sensor permission has been granted, otherwise false.

member.name: T:Topsens.Unity.PermissionHandler
member.summary: The delegate of callback handler to process permission requesting result (Dedicated for TOPSENS own cameras).
member.param: Sensor permission instance that initiates the callback.

member.name: T:Topsens.Unity.Resources
member.summary: The resources management under Unity Android platform (Dedicated for all third-party cameras).

member.name: T:Topsens.Unity.VectorExtension
member.summary: The extension class of Vector2, Vector3 and Vector4.
